articles.title: Danniella Westbrook's face ravaged by years of drug abuse as star gets £500k NHS surgery - The Mirror
articles.description: Danniella Westbrook is to receive facial surgery worth £500,000 on the NHS in order to to battle some difficult health problems. The former EastEnders actress has suffered from drug addiction over the years
articles.content:
Ex-EastEnders star Danniella Westbrook is to have around £500,00 of facial surgery to repair her ravaged face.

articles.title: Royal POLL: Should Thomas Markle be welcomed to UK during the Platinum Jubilee? - Express
articles.description: THOMAS MARKLE has announced that he will travel to London for the first time for the Queen's Platinum Jubilee celebrations. Do you think he should be welcomed to the UK? Vote in our poll.
